issue.title: [CF 464] Glyph Conditions
issue.body:
Cybeloras edit: This is a feature request, not a defect.

I looked in the conditions section of the options to see if I could set a condition based on the glyphs I had, but I noticed there was no option to check this. It would be useful for cases like Death and Decay, where the glyph increases the duration of it by 5 seconds.


> Posted by CurseForge user yesitisi | Imported from CurseForge issue #464 | Raw
